text: Analytical Methods is a monthly peer-reviewed scientific journal covering research on the development of analytical techniques. It is published by the Royal Society of Chemistry and the editor-in-chief is Scott Martin (Saint Louis University). ==Abstracting and indexing== The journal is abstracted and indexed in Chemical Abstracts Service, Science Citation Index, and Scopus. According to the Journal Citation Reports, the journal has a 2017 impact factor of 2.073. ==References== == External links == * *Analytical Methods Blog Category:Chemistry journals Category:Royal Society of Chemistry academic journals Category:Publications established in 2009 Category:English-language journals Category:Hybrid open access journals Category:Monthly journals
title: Analytical Methods (journal)
